sentences.sentence: There's no denying that our own little Wilbur – he's part of something that's bigger than all of us. And life on that farm is just a whole lot better with him in it. He really is some pig.
sentences.translation: 不可否认，我们的小韦伯，从某种意义上讲，比我们更伟大。自从有了他，农场的生活好了很多，他真的是一头神奇的猪。

sentences.sentence: We can't all be heroes, because somebody has to sit on the curb and applaud when they go by.
sentences.translation: 我们不可能都成为英雄，总得有人在英雄走过的时候坐在路边鼓掌。

sentences.sentence: I am a slow walker, but I never walk backwards.
sentences.translation: 我走得很慢，但是我从来不会后退。

sentences.sentence: Everybody in this world got their own place.
sentences.translation: 这世上的每个人都有自己的位置。

sentences.sentence: Be sure to attend all classes and leave enough time to finish your assignments and prepare well for examinations.
sentences.translation: 一定要参加所有的课程，留下足够的时间完成你的作业，好好准备考试。
